name: Bitnob – Accept Bitcoin Payments (On-chain & Lightning)
author: Bitnob

sections.installation:
Install via the searchable Plugin Directory within your WordPress site’s plugin page.
(Or: Upload bitnob-payments.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.)
Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

  • Go to https://app.bitnob.co to sign up a free account
  • Generate and copy your secret key.
  • Go to Woo-commerce > Settings > Payment > enable Enable Bitnob Gateway
  • Paste you Secret key
sections.faq:
Can customer pay with bitcoins without registering on my website?

No account needed for your customers to pay with bitcoins. They can just scan the payment QR code if they are paying with lightning or QR code and enter the right amount if they are using on-chain to pay.
Super Easy.

Which bitcoin wallet do you support?

We support all BTC or Lightning wallets allowing public keys

Can you help me to integrate bitcoin payments to my website?

Yes we can our support team is always here to help. Contact us by e-mail at support@bitnob.com

sections.description:
Accept Bitcoin on your website via on chain or lightning right away. Powered by Bitnob.

With an easy setup of our plugin, you can get up and running with our simple-to-use-plugin.

With minimal or no learning curve, you can enjoy the benefits bitcoin payments and lightning bring to you and your customers.

Bitnob for Woocommerce

This plugin equips online businesses using WordPress WooCommerce with the ability to accept and process bitcoin payments via on-chain or lightning seamlessly.

Dedicated support.

  • No chargebacks or fraud.
  • No setup cost or recurring fees.
  • Non custodial system: wallet to wallet, no intermediary.
  • View transactions on your Bitnob dashboard
  • In addition, we offer bitcoin to local currency settlement too:

Easily settle payments to your bank account in your local currency.
Accept bitcoin payments without needing to understand or handle bitcoin.
5. Your bitnon user dashboard

Settlement Options

We offer 2 easy options for more flexibility.

Bitcoin (Free): Direct bitcoin payments without any fee. From their wallet to yours, total privacy, without going through Bitnob.
Local currency (withdrawal fee): No volatility. Easily withdraw to your bank account.

Supported Currencies

  • United States dollar (USD)
  • Nigerian Naira (NGN)
  • Ghanaian Cedis (GHS)

About Bitnob

At Bitnob, we have one single Mission, which is making it easy for every African and African business to connect with the bitcoin blockchain.

3rd-party user dashboard used;

This user dashboard is owned by Bitnob, it allows you to setup your account and BTC wallet to receive payments
app.bitnob.co
Read Privacy Policy and Terms of Service
